messages.content:
✅ **Campaign Paused Successfully**

The Apex Motors campaign (mb_apex_motors_q1) has been paused. 

**Changes Applied:**
- Campaign status changed from **active** to **paused**

**Impact:**
- Delivery has been stopped completely (100% reach reduction)
- No further spend will occur until the campaign is resumed

**Notifications:**
- ✅ Slack notification sent to #adcp-demo
- ✅ Email draft generated and ready to send

The campaign will remain paused until you decide to resume it. Just let me know when you'd like to reactivate it!
